@graph.name: Tempeh Tacos - Nora Cooks
@graph.description: These Tempeh Tacos are loaded with smoky tempeh meat and vegan toppings. Whip them up in no time for an easy make-ahead meal!

@graph.name: Tempeh Tacos
@graph.description: These smoky and savory Tempeh Tacos are loaded with seasoned tempeh and a variety of toppings. Whip them up ahead of time for an easy weeknight meal!
recipeIngredient: Vegan Nacho Cheese (or vegan shredded cheese)

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the tempeh from the packages, and cut into a few rough pieces. Place in a food processor, and pulse several times until it's a bit crumbly. Don't over process into a paste! Alternatively, you can grate it or chop it small.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the tempeh from the packages, and cut into a few rough pieces. Place in a food processor, and pulse several times until it's a bit crumbly. Don't over process into a paste! Alternatively, you can grate it or chop it small.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large sauté pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and sauté for 3-4 minutes, until translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large sauté pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and sauté for 3-4 minutes, until translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tempeh and sauté for about 5 minutes, until the tempeh is golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tempeh and sauté for about 5 minutes, until the tempeh is golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the soy sauce, cumin, smoked paprika, chili powder, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, tomato paste and water. Stir well and bring to simmer. Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring constantly. If the mixture gets too dry, add a little bit of water until the consistency is just right.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add the soy sauce, cumin, smoked paprika, chili powder, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, tomato paste and water. Stir well and bring to simmer. Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring constantly. If the mixture gets too dry, add a little bit of water until the consistency is just right.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve in warm tortillas with desired toppings. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Serve in warm tortillas with desired toppings. Enjoy!
